name: Real Terrorists Elite Commando
description:
Real Terrorists Elite Commando mission is very dangerous and challenging for Elite Commando. In Real terrorists Elite Commando the battlefield in the face of brutal enemies, to protect themselves and destroy the enemy. You are a frontline commando in this game. Elite Commando game based on the modern shooting game mission. through a series of missions to complete the final war. You are a modern sniper shooter. The goal of game mission is to shoot every terrorists, kill every enemy, and survive in the game. This game is commando shooting and war games.
In Real Terrorists Elite Commando, enjoy the game to bring you the real experience. This action shooter has many Interesting missions. These interesting features make this counter terrorists shooting game unique and addictive for everyone. In this war, your duty is to shoot, kill and complete the mission.
In Real Terrorists Elite Commando, the brave commando has accepted the difficult mission of going to the city to destroy the terrorists. This mission is very challenging, in the battlefield in the face of brutal enemies, to protect themselves and destroy the enemy.
In Real Terrorists Elite Commando, Now it is time to put a counter attack on the terrorist sleeping cells and kill them all.

Terrorist are hiding out in a building, Hurry up and shoot all the terrorists down. In Real Terrorists Elite Commando hit the trigger and move, throw hand grenades, do it quickly there is short time to do the job, be a super hero and fight with deadly shooters. This is the best counter terrorist sniper shooting games in 3D for shooting players. You are a secret agent kill enemies by your shooting skills.

Features:
• HD 3D graphics
• Realistic 3D shooting battlefield environment
• Simple and smooth operation
• a large number of advanced powerful weapons
• Radar vision positioning the enemy's position
• Challenges of increasing levels of difficulty
• Best quality attractive sound effects
• Play anytime, anywhere
